openscap.profile_description: This profile defines a baseline that aligns with the "Intermediate" configuration of the CCN-STIC-610A22 Guide issued by the National Cryptological Center of Spain in 2022-10.  The CCN-STIC-610A22 guide includes hardening settings for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 at basic, intermediate, and advanced levels.
openscap.profile_name: Centro Criptol√≥gico Nacional (CCN) - STIC for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 - Intermediate
